item.description:
Let's have a Resistance night more in the style of "How to Host a Murder".  That is, tonight will be a potluck night.  Bring a dish and between courses we will play a round of the Resistance.   Food, wine, chocolate and overthrowing the government.  Sound like fun? :-D

The first round will be no whiteboards, no notepads, no nothing.  Only your memories, your words and your deceptive wit.

For those of you new to this game, this is a social guessing game where we take on roles and have to guess the roles of others without revealing our own.  It's really easy so feel free to sign up if it piques your interest.

...And remember, if Carolyn shows up, she is automatically guilty. ;-)

---

Food:

Drinks will be provided.  This is a potluck so please let us know what dish you are bringing.

---

About the location:

This event will be hosted at a private residence, conveniently located at the intersections of Route 1 and Route 95.  If you need directions, just ask.  This is a housing complex, so please do NOT park in any numbered spaces.  There are no animals on the premises and the property should be child-friendly.  Look for Unit 901 since Meetup doesn't display addresses correctly! :-(

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Mini-Meetup: Resistance Potluck
